title: How much can you make writing? - Quora

response.answer_text: unlimited! Good writing skill is like a golden egg - you can do anything you want! You can write a blog, you can be a storyteller, you can write content for a website, you can write content for a product, you can literally do anything. You can start writing about anything you love to do and convert this into the money generating business. This is what I am doing on Quora always - see my profile. I write the stuff about the services I offer in a convincing pay and I earn thousands just by writing. The Internet has no definition without writing, you can start writing about anything engaging and persuading and you can whatever you want. There are portals where you can write the assignments and do somebody’s homework for money. You can contact some SEO companies or people independently and they can pay you for writing a blog article for their clients’ websites. Find the best website that pays you for writing: Writers Work | Write Your Way to the Life You Want Get hundreds of them below: 100 Websites that Pay Writers in 2019 Well, writing is oceanic and it can help you generate a whopping money every day sitting right at your own place. I hope this helps :)

Think of your book as a product. Now here's the thing, to be a millionaire, you need to sell that product to a million of a hundred thousand people (depending on the price range and revenues) So writing can actually be a very lucrative business if one knows how to make good books and sell them.
